name: Life 2.0
description:
Can you go from living on the street to being the Chairman of a major corporation?

In Life 2.0 the world is at your feet but can you keep on top of everything and reach for the stars.

This is a life simulation game. You start on the street where you can only earn money by begging. The more you earn the more you can do. Buy a car, get a degree and even buy your own private jet.
